name: Data Vogue!
tagline: My thoughts on Data, Technology and the Surroundings!
body:
### Hello World!
This marks the start of my journey in the world of blogging. I hope to be regular in writing anything new I learn, or revisit the old. Hope you also enjoy this ride with me. Please be open about your thoughts on my articles, blogs, tutorials, and help making me a better writer and a better tech evangelist in the process.

Cheers,
Varad
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
